H0.text: Which British band reached number one in the UK pop charts in June 1983 with the record 'Every Breath You Take'. The Cure

H1.text: Which British band reached number one in the UK pop charts in June 1983 with the record 'Every Breath You Take'. Duran Duran

H2.text: Which British band reached number one in the UK pop charts in June 1983 with the record 'Every Breath You Take'. Depeche Mode

H3.text: Which British band reached number one in the UK pop charts in June 1983 with the record 'Every Breath You Take'. POLICE

A4.text: Its lead single, 'Every Breath You Take', became their fifth UK number one, and only US number one.

A5.text: Their final studio album, Synchronicity (1983), was No. 1 in the UK, Canada, Australia, Italy and the US, selling over 8 million copies in the US.
